net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component

Class ComponentImpl.FocusProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.ComponentImpl.FocusProperties
  • Enclosing class:
    ComponentImpl

    public static class ComponentImpl.FocusProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Properties only used for components that may receive focus.
    Author:
    Pat Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Field Detail

      • elementName

        java.lang.String elementName
        The form element name.

      • elementPrefix

        java.lang.String elementPrefix
        Form element prefix.

      • focusTraversable

        boolean focusTraversable
        Determines if this component can receive focus by a focus traverse gesture, default is true.

      • mediumUpdateProperties

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> mediumUpdateProperties
        Holds medium updates that are being processed. The goal of this collection is so that a component can tell the difference between the medium updating the model (Component) and the application logic updating the model. In the case of the medium updating the model the component need not be invalidated in such a way to cause the medium to be updated because the medium already has the most up to date information. In the case of the application performing the update the component must be invalidated. The value is the name of the property.

      • nextFocusableComponent

        Component nextFocusableComponent
        The component to receive focus after this component.

      • requestFocusEnabled

        boolean requestFocusEnabled
        Determines if the requestFocus method can be used to grab the focus, default is true.

      • requestFocusPending

        boolean requestFocusPending
        Indicates if a request focus is pending. This happens if ComponentImpl.requestFocus() is called before being attached to the WindowManager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FocusProperties

        public FocusProperties()
